nodes.text: Jakko Mixon , also known as Mixon Guncher was a male Bith and slitherhorn player in a band called the Dewback Ramblers.
After the Battle of Yavin, Jakko Mixon and the Dewback Ramblers operated out of the Lucky Star cantina in Mos Entha, on the planet Tatooine.

Circa 1 ABY, Jakko Mixon fell for an old scam, where he believed he could get a cheap ride from someone to Bestine. Instead, Jakko ended up stranded in the desert. Fortunately for him, the leader of the band, Blerx Tango, employed a spacer to find Jakko and bring him back safely to Mos Entha.
Blerx Tando was a non-player character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. In the game, players doing a mission for Blerx Tango had to rescue Jakko.
Though not mentioned in the quest dialogue, examining Jakko revealed him to also be a sniper.
